title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 29.3 - Trial courts
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 29.3 - Trial courts

State Regulations

Audio-visual coverage of proceedings in the
trial courts shall be permitted only in accordance with the provisions of Part
131 of the Rules of the Chief Administrator. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
29.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
